snippet.title: CUSTOM MECH WARS - Announcement Trailer Ver.1.5
snippet.description:
Creativity fuels conflict...
A mecha action shooter with Omega Customization options "CUSTOM MECH WARS"
Scheduled for release in December 14th, 2023 for #PS5 & #Steam!

The collaboration with D3PUBLISHER's popular action-shooter "EARTH DEFENSE FORCES" series has been revealed!
The "Gigantic Unloader Barga" and other powerful weapons from the "EARTH DEFENSE FORCES" series will join this "CUSTOM MECH WARS" as collaborative downloadable content.

■SPEC
Title: CUSTOM MECH WARS
Platforms: PlayStation5/Steam
Release Date: December 14th, 2023
Genre: TPS 3D Action Shooting game
# of Player: Offline: 1 player / Online: 1-4 players(co-op)
Voice Actors: Yosuke Omomo, Akira Sekine, Kotono Mitsuishi, Nobuhiko Okamoto, Lynn, Yuu Maeda, Mina Mizuki, Emi Uema, Shunsuke Todo, Nobuyuki Hiyama, Kikuko Inoue, Kikuko Inoue, Tomoko Kaneda etc.
*Some cast members are in DLC.
Publisher: D3PUBLISHER Inc.

Follow the latest news on:

■Official Website
https://www.d3p.co.jp/cmw/

■X(Twitter)
https://twitter.com/cmw_en

■Discord
https://discord.gg/NSthqQUadY

■PlayStation Store
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10007386

■Steam Store
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2328310

©2023 D3PUBLISHER
